document.full_text: "glee" star jane lynch will host the primetime emmy awards ceremony in september, organizers of the television industry's top honors said on thursday.
document.title: "glee" star jane lynch to host 2011 emmy awards
lines_and_colors: "glee" star jane lynch will host the primetime emmy awards ceremony in september, organizers of the television industry's top honors said on thursday.
